level.heading: Review and approval of petitions for revocable consents to construct and operate sidewalk cafes which require special permits.
level.text: ยง 20-227 Review and approval of petitions for revocable consents to construct and operate sidewalk cafes which require special permits. Notwithstanding the provisions of any other section of the charter or code, a petition for a revocable consent to construct and operate a sidewalk cafe which requires a special permit modification pursuant to the zoning resolution shall be reviewed and approved in accordance with the provisions of sections one hundred ninety-seven-c and one hundred ninety-seven-d of the charter and shall require the approval of the department. The consent shall be for such term and upon such conditions as may be provided in the approval of the department but shall be revocable at any time by the department. The separate and additional approval of the mayor shall be necessary to its validity. The consent shall provide for fees to be paid annually to the city during the continuance of the consent. Such fees shall be calculated pursuant to a formula established by rule or by local law pursuant to section 20-225(j) or section 20-226 (h).
